content: happy new year is a 10 inch afghan square made with stylecraft special dk and hook size 4mm/g with aran weight yarn it will give you a 12 inch square happy new year is a fairly simple square with only 4 ends to weave in enjoy and have an awesome year if you want to see more of my work please visit my crochet page https //www facebook com/something-crochet-1875698805791418/
